abstract: As the market waits for the CIT Group to formally announce its lifeline from a group of some of its biggest bondholders, DealBook has learned several more details about the plan.
snippet: As the market waits for the CIT Group to formally announce its lifeline from a group of some of its biggest bondholders, DealBook has learned several more details about the plan.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:43 p.m. The CIT Group formally announced its $3 billion financial lifeline from its investors. You can read the release, which confirms many of the details below, here. More to come.

headline.main: CIT Announces Its $3 Billion Rescue Plan

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
